name: HOLES - WebGL
description:
THIS IS THE BROWSER VERSION OF "HOLES" AS THE SUBMISSIONS OF THE JAM HAS ENDED.. Have fun !!

Here's the original release - https://sashbros.itch.io/holes

Play the game and share the time taken by you to complete the game!!!!

More than 600 seconds is not good for your gaming career!! XD

Controls:

A-D: Left-Right

SPACE: Jump

Mouse: Aim

Left Click: SHOOT

Right Click: Throw Hook (Grab with ROPE)
